descriptionHtml:
Adds a chest in Riverwood next to alvors\' forge Contains items used for crafting ie). Leather, Ingots, Ore, Jewels and More! 1000 of every item haven\'t worked out how to make it re-spawn yet, I heard that there is a mod that can control this. I am no longer working on this or any other mods until further notice. probably tax time when i can buy a new computer..>.>

Thanks for downloading and Enjoy(:
author: Brandonmsake93
